snippet.title: Beholder Trailer [English]
snippet.description:
You'll LIVE in a grim totalitarian future and SERVE the State that appointed you a landlord! You’ll SPY on tenants and REPORT on ideological subversions! Will you ABIDE by the laws? Or will you CHOOSE to pursue your own interests? In this world where privacy is dead, who will you side with?

Beholder on Steam: http://goo.gl/iUPq4F
Beholder on the App Store: https://goo.gl/ugmtNO 
Beholder on Google Play: https://goo.gl/99fcT8 
Beholder on Microsoft Store: https://goo.gl/oFYDdW 
Beholder on Amazon Appstore: https://goo.gl/BgxWPc
Web-site: https://goo.gl/XefvgZ
